name: Life in the Twilight
description:
Life in the Twilight is a single-player horror game in the form of a third person. In Life in the Twilight, you play as a survivor who wakes up in the waiting room. Your goal is to survive, escape from the dungeon. Throughout the game, you will be able to learn more about the place where you are and will meet dead and living prisoners. Being wary of their fate, you will have to be on the run from the guards throughout the game.
The game is a short story in which everyone can see their own meaning.

The estimated time of passage is ~ 40 minutes.
